title: Match found/accepted freeze
body:
Queue for game.  Accept game.  Wheel stops counting down and goes full.  Then....nothing.  Currently running the full repair; but this is a seriously uncool bug; especially considering that I still get the queue penalty.  

Help me, Rito, you're my only hope.

replies.body:
I have  been having these issues like crazy lately. Now, I am aware fully that my internet connection is absolutely fine and has no interference whatsoever. I've been getting penalties for leaving the game, when I have not left a single one, and every time it is due to interface freezing. I tried repairing, changing internet settings, re-installing - nothing worked.
Additionally, I have issued a ticket to riot - no response, ticket dismissed. 
Please, help me fix this problem, because I cannot play this game anymore. 
I am writing this now, after receiving 6 in a row freezes and a 20minute penalty - THANKS RITO :(

I am writing again, just to extra-bump this, as I keep getting increasingly worse lagg issues via champion select with not a single solution whatsoever. 
It's also annoying as I keep getting penalties for leaving, even though I have nothing to do with the issue.{{champion:32}}

This happens to me and my girlfriend all the time after the last patch.  We sat in queue for 4 minutes had to re-queue and it happened again after somone dodged with 2 seconds left in lobby.  Please address this.

These issues usually pop up if you have a **poor connection** to our matchmaking servers. This could be for a number of reasons, however, incompatible network settings are the primary culprits. You should be able to resolve this by working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) in its entirety.

If you run into further issues with this, let me know.

I'm glad I'm not the only one experiencing this. It is quite annoying being kicked from match finding after you have accepted, then it freezes, tells you: "a player has declined matchmaking" but you cannot accept the new match because your old one is still frozen and then you get kicked.
